channel.title: Weird Waves
channel.description: Audio horror broadcasting online, from Old Time Radio to classic horror story audiobooks to freaky modern podcasts.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-09-21
item.description: Added buttons to the code-blocks in the Streaming section that copy their respective code-blocks to your clipboard.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-09-10
item.description: Fully disabled first and last move-show buttons on playlist instead of just blocking the script for moving shows.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-09-07
item.description: Added series show counts back in as another option for re-ordering the series stats list in the "About" section and corrected a minor typo in the Archive.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-09-05
item.description: Switched the stats list from displaying the number of shows per series to the total duration of the series in hours, sorted by duration.

item.title: Weird Waves News: 2023-09-04
item.description: Added the total number of hours of audio in the site to the stats list.
